Sentencas: An integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a water multi-effect desalination system is herein developed for simultaneous power generation and thermal waste recovery.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: A heat recovery steam generator is employed for steam generation using outlet thermal energy from the system.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: Next the generated steam enters into a multi-stage desalination system for producing fresh water.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: The fuel cell over-potential and gained voltage are obtained using operating conditions, flow rate and electrochemical modeling of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: By adding a Stirling engine, the power output is increased to 2.63 kW and the system efficiency is increased by 11.7%.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: Fresh water is produced by 143.64 kg/h using the recovered energy of the system.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: In the following, the performance of the system is being analyzed in terms of important variables of the system.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: The results show that by increasing the temperature of the fuel cell up to 100 degrees C, the power and efficiency of the fuel cell increase by 2 kW and 1.8%, respectively.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit

Sentencas: Additionally, the amount of produced fresh water is increased up to 65% with the number of desalination stages from 4 to 6 stages.
Titulo: Developing of an integrated hybrid power generation system combined with a multi-effect desalination unit
